name: grungy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person) feeling tired and dirty, or (of a thing) dirty: He showed up for the interview wearing some grungy old sweatshirt and jeans. Synonyms
dirty (NOT CLEAN)
filthy (DIRTY)
grimy
grubby

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person) feeling dirty and that you need to wash, or (of a thing) dirty: After a 15-hour flight, I felt really grungy.
